Package basica.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • basica.client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInfo, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientType1, ClientType2, ClientType3
    public abstract class Client
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ClientInfo
    A class which represents a client. It's an abstract class because there will be some different clients who will have different interest in buying actions.
    Author:
    Aaron Cabero Blanco
    See Also:
